name: Liss Ramgurl
text: I don't mind paying the charges but why can't they just penalize pranksters? This is supposed to be a public service, accessible to everyone for use during emergencies after all. I know from personal experience that if you do not have remaining credit,  outgoing calls will not be permitted.      Ah, I know what the others are going to say -- "it's their fault if they do not have prepaid credits. Sorry, not sorry."     *slow clap*
